text: Judit Földing-Nagy (in Hungary: Földingné Nagy Judit, born 9 December 1965) is a Hungarian runner who specializes in the marathon. She was born in Győr, Győr-Moson-Sopron. She is the current Hungarian record-holder in marathon. She was a bronze medallist at the IAU 100 km European Championships in 2012.European 100 km Championships. Association of Road Racing Statisticians (2016-02-06).
